title: Pokemon: Pikachu, Kore Nan no Kagi? (Pikachu, What's This Key?)
synopsis: A thrilling tale in which a group of innocent pokemon get sucked into a world full of keys only to find themselves trapped. Will they ever escape?
related_anime: ['Pokemon Movie 17: Hakai no Mayu to Diancie', 'Pokemon XY']
voices: ['Ootani, Ikue', 'Inuyama, Inuko', 'Matsumoto, Rica', 'Makiguchi, Mayuki', 'Kaji, Yuki', 'Ise, Mariya', 'Ueda, Yuuji', 'Watanabe, Mayu']
